Jorda, E
Ramon, M D
Betlloch, I
Verdeguer, J M
metadata.dc:description: A 31 years old woman had an exanthematic eruption of small and acral distributed papules. At the same time she suffered a clinical and biological hepatitis B. This case is described attending to the clinic, histopathology and direct immunofluorescence. By the way the Gianotti-Crosti syndrome is reviewed.

[Gianotti-Crosti syndrome in an adult].
